content: **this pattern is written in standard american crochet terms ** includes full video demo skill level easy/intermediate stitches used include chain slip_stitch single_crochet double_crochet 2dc-cluster **finished size ** each square measures approx 6 5 wide make as many squares as you d like to create a blanket of any dimensions suggested sizes before optional edging 32 5 x 32 5 = 5 x 5 or 25 squares 32 5 x 39 = 5 x 6 or 30 squares 39 x 45 5 = 6 x 7 or 42 squares 45 5 x 58 5 = 7 x 9 or 63 squares 52 x 71 5 = 8 x 11 = 88 squares **materials ** red heart all-in-one granny square aran worsted weight yarn a single 250-gram skein makes approx 14 motifs according to the manufacturer sample used color black-hyper violet approx 26 yards per square crochet hook size h 5 0 mm or similar
